Title: Skycutters
Intro: Each model in a Skycutters unit is armed with one of the following weapon options: Eagle Eye Bolt Thrower and Agents’ Blades and Spears; or Swifthawk Bows and Agents’ Blades and Spears. Each model in the unit must be armed with the same weapon option.

Rules.Name: Mount
Rules.Rule: MOUNT: This unit’s Swiftfeather Hawks are each armed with Raking Talons.

Rules.Name: Aelven Shields
Rules.Rule: ABILITIES Add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target this unit.

Rules.Name: Agents’ Blades And Spears
Rules.Rule: Agents’ Blades and Spears: If this unit is armed with Swifthawk Bows and Agents’ Blades and Spears, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of its Agents’ Blades and Spears.

Rules.Name: Fleet Of Wing
Rules.Rule: Fleet of Wing: Roll 2D6 instead of single dice when making a run roll for this unit.

Rules.Name: Sky Chariot
Rules.Rule: This unit can run and still shoot later in the turn.

Rules.Name: Swifthawk Discipline
Rules.Rule: If you fail a battleshock test for this unit whilst it is within 16" of a friendly SWIFTHAWK AGENTS HERO, halve the number of models that flee (rounding up).
